hero.title: Citext Browser Extensions
hero.description: Capture references instantly while browsing the web with our powerful browser extensions. Save articles, web pages, and PDFs directly to your Citext library with a single click.

chrome.title: Citext Capture for Chrome
chrome.subtitle: Available Now
chrome.description: Citext Capture is a lightweight browser extension that helps researchers, students, and academics instantly capture references, sources, and bibliographic metadata while browsing the web. With a single click, Citext Capture detects academic articles, web pages, PDFs, and online resources, extracts key citation information (such as title, authors, publication date, and URL), and sends them directly to your Citext workspace for later use.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature1: One-click capture of academic articles and web pages
features.feature3: Direct integration with your Citext library

otherBrowsers.title: Coming Soon to Other Browsers
otherBrowsers.description: We're working hard to bring Citext Capture to more browsers. Stay tuned for updates!

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Install Citext Capture and start collecting references effortlessly. Create your free account to sync your captures across all devices.
